review: Dr.  Mihir & Dr. Isha provided exceptional care during my recent visit. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and gentle approach made me feel comfortable throughout the procedure. I highly recommend their services to anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: This was our first visit to the clinic.And i was really anxious about the treatment but Dr.Mihir Shah n Dr. Isha they were very friendly n making my child  feel very comfy before n during the session,which eases out the entire process They very diligently explain the whole process n cleared all my doubts.The doctors also give some  gifts after every session which also encourages the kids. Overall we had a very good experience I would recommend Dr Mihir Shah  one of the finest pediatric dentist.üëç

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My daughter was 8yrs old when we started her treatment with Dr Mihir. She was a mouth breather and her front teeth were misaligned and second layer of teeth started erupting in the lower jaw. 
He explained the issue the prognosis and took utmost care in every sitting. My daughter's mouth breathing has stopped and her teeth are straight now after 2.5 yrs of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My 8year old son needed to get his deep cavity to be treated. At first I was very sceptical about the process, but after meeting the doctor and understanding the process I knew I could trust him with my son. He has done an amazing job not only with the treatment but also in managing a child to sit through the entire treatment. You really need alot of patience to do that. Thank you Dr Mihir, I would recommend Dr Mihir to all parents who's child needs dental attention.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Mihir and his wife are excellent in how meticulously they explain all the dental problems faced and best possible treatment options available.They patiently explain the procedure to parents and kids as well and ensure the child is very comfortable and prepared for the procedure. Highly recommend them for their skill, expertise and patient experience.
reply_text:
Thank you for such a valuable feedback,
Active participation of parents like you in the child's treatment motivates us to do better, Thank you to Child Amanda, Mom & family for your support
